<DIV STYLE="page-break-after:always"></DIV>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Right-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P ALIGN=RIGHT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>EXHIBIT 10.52</FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=3>RADIOSHACK CORPORATION <BR>OFFICER&#146;S
SUPPLEMENTAL<BR> EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT
PLAN </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE ONE </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>PURPOSE </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 1.1</B> &nbsp;The purpose of this
RadioShack Corporation Officer&#146;s Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (&#147;the
Plan&#148;) is to enable RadioShack Corporation and its subsidiaries to provide key
executive personnel certain death and retirement benefits. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE TWO </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>DEFINITIONS </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.1</B> &nbsp;<B>Beneficiary.</B>
The recipient(s) designated (in accordance with Article&nbsp;Seven) by a Participant in
the Plan to whom benefits are payable following his death. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.2</B> &nbsp;<B>Benefit Service
Year. </B>The service that is used to determine a Participant&#146;s Plan Benefit under
this Plan. Each Participant shall be granted one-twelfth of a year of Benefit Services
Year for each full or partial calendar month of his employment with RadioShack commencing
on the date of his appointment as an officer of RadioShack and ending with the date
termination of employment with RadioShack. Determination of Benefit Service Years shall be
subject to the following: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 1- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
          <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0>
               <TR VALIGN=TOP>
               <TD ALIGN=RIGHT WIDTH=5%></TD>
               <TD WIDTH=95%><P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;
               Separate years of Participant&#146;s service with RadioShack as an officer shall
               be aggregated for purposes of determining Benefit Service Years. </FONT></P></TD>
               </TR>
               </TABLE>
               <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 1- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
          <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0>
               <TR VALIGN=TOP>
               <TD ALIGN=RIGHT WIDTH=5%></TD>
               <TD WIDTH=95%><P ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;
               A Participant&#146;s authorized Leave of Absence will not interrupt continuing
               of employment of a Participant as an officer for purposes of the Plan. </FONT></P></TD>
               </TR>
               </TABLE>
               <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.3</B>&nbsp; <B>Benefit Service
Years Credit. </B>A Participant&#146;s Benefit Service Years Credit shall be equal to 2.5%
multiplied by the Participant&#146;s Benefit Service Years. In no event shall a
Participant&#146;s Benefit Service Years Credit exceed 50%. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.4</B>&nbsp; <B>Change in Control.</b>
  For purpose of the Plan, a "Change in Control" shall mean any of the following events:</FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          An acquisition (other than directly from RadioShack (the &#147;Company&#148; for
          purposes of this definition)) of any voting securities of the Company (the
          &#147;Voting Securities&#148;) by any &#147;Person&#148; (as the term person is
          used for purposes of Section 13(d) or 14(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of
          1934, as amended (the &#147;1934 Act&#148;)) immediately after which such Person
          has &#147;Beneficial Ownership&#148; (within the meaning of Rule 13d-3
          promulgated under the 1934 Act) of fifteen percent (15%) or more of the combined
          voting power of the Company&#146;s then outstanding Voting Securities; provided,
          however, in determining whether a Change in Control has occurred, Voting
          Securities which are acquired in a Non-Control Acquisition (as hereinafter
          defined) shall not constitute an acquisition which would cause a Change in
          Control. </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>A &#147;Non-Control Acquisition&#148;
shall mean an acquisition by (i) an employee benefit plan (or a trust forming a part
thereof) maintained by (A) the Company or (B) any corporation or other Person of which a
majority of its voting power or its voting equity securities or equity interest is owned,
directly or indirectly, by the Company (for purposes of this definition, a
&#147;Subsidiary&#148;), (ii) the Company or its Subsidiaries, or (iii) any Person in
connection with a Non-Control Transaction (as hereinafter defined); </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          The individuals who, as of January 1, 2006, are members of the Board (the
          &#147;Incumbent Board&#148;), cease for any reason to constitute at least
          two-thirds of the Board; provided, however, that if the election, or nomination
          for election by the Company&#146;s stockholders, of any new director was
          approved by a vote of at least two-thirds of the Incumbent Board, such new
          director shall, for purposes of this Plan, be considered as a member of the
          Incumbent Board; provided further, however, that no individual shall be
          considered a member of the Incumbent Board if such individual initially assumed
          office as a result of either an actual or threatened &#147;Election
          Contest&#148; (as described in Rule 14a-11 promulgated under the 1934 Act) or
          other actual or threatened solicitation of proxies or consents by or on behalf
          of a Person other than the Board (a &#147;Proxy Contest&#148;) including by
          reason of any agreement intended to avoid or settle any Election Contest or
          Proxy Contest; or </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          The consummation of: </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;&nbsp; A
merger, consolidation, reorganization or other business combination with or
          into the Company or in which securities of the Company are issued, unless  </FONT></P>



<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;the
stockholders of the Company, immediately before such merger, consolidation,
          reorganization or other business combination, own directly or indirectly
          immediately following such merger, consolidation, reorganization or other
          business combination, at least sixty percent (60%) of the combined voting power
          of the outstanding voting securities of the corporation resulting from such
          merger or consolidation, reorganization or other business combination (the
          &#147;Surviving Corporation&#148;) in substantially the same proportion as
their           ownership of the Voting Securities immediately before such merger,
          consolidation, reorganization or other business combination,  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          execution of the agreement providing for such merger, consolidation,
          reorganization or other business combination constitute at least two-thirds of
          the members of the board of directors of the Surviving Corporation, or a
          corporation beneficially directly or indirectly owning a majority of the
          combined voting power of the outstanding voting securities of the Surviving
          Corporation, or  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(C)&nbsp;&nbsp;no
Person other than (i) the Company, (ii) any Subsidiary, (iii) any employee
          benefit plan (or any trust forming a part thereof) that, immediately prior to
          such merger, consolidation, reorganization or other business combination was
          maintained by the Company, the Surviving Corporation, or any Subsidiary, or
(iv)           any Person who, immediately prior to such merger, consolidation,
reorganization           or other business combination had Beneficial Ownership of
fifteen percent (15%)           or more of the then outstanding Voting Securities, has
Beneficial Ownership of           fifteen percent (15%) or more of the combined voting
power of the Surviving           Corporation&#146;s then outstanding voting securities,
and  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>A transaction described in clauses (A)
through (C) shall herein be referred to as a &#147;Non-Control Transaction.&#148; </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          A complete liquidation or dissolution of the Company; or </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
          sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the
          Company to any Person (other than (i) any such sale or disposition that results
          in at least fifty percent (50%) of the Company&#146;s assets being owned by one
          or more subsidiaries or (ii) a distribution to the Company&#146;s stockholders
          of the stock of a subsidiary or any other assets). </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>Notwithstanding the foregoing, a
Change in Control shall not be deemed to occur solely because any Person (the
&#147;Subject Person&#148;) acquired Beneficial Ownership of more than the permitted
amount of the then outstanding Voting Securities (X) as a result of the acquisition of
Voting Securities by the Company which, by reducing the number of Voting Securities
outstanding, increases the proportional number of shares Beneficially Owned by the Subject
Person, provided that if a Change in Control would occur (but for the operation of this
subsection (X)) as a result of the acquisition of Voting Securities by the Company, and
after such share acquisition by the Company, the Subject Person becomes the Beneficial
Owner of any additional Voting Securities which increases the percentage of the then
outstanding Voting Securities Beneficially Owned by the Subject Person, then a Change in
Control shall occur, or (Y) and such Subject Person (1) within fourteen (14) Business Days
(or such greater period of time as may be determined by action of the Board) after such
Subject Person would otherwise have caused a Change in Control (but for the operation of
this clause (Y)), such Subject Person notifies the Board that such Subject Person did so
inadvertently, and (2) within seven (7) Business Days after such notification (or such
greater period of time as may be determined by action of the Board), such Subject Person
divests itself of a sufficient number of Voting Securities so that such Subject Person is
no longer the Beneficial Owner of more than the permitted amount of the outstanding Voting
Securities. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.5</B> &nbsp;<B>Committee.
</B>The Management Development and Compensation Committee (or any successor committee
under any different name) of the Board of Directors of RadioShack. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.6</B>&nbsp; <B>Disability.</B>
A physical or mental condition which, in the sole opinion of the Committee, totally and
permanently, prevents a Participant from substantially performing duties for which such
Participant is suited to perform either by education or training, or if such Participant
is on a Leave of Absence when such condition develops, substantially performing duties for
which such Participant is suited to perform either by education or training. A
determination that Disability exists shall be based upon competent medical evidence
satisfactory to the Committee. The date that any person&#146;s Disability occurs shall be
deemed to be the date such condition is determined to exist by the Committee. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.7</B> &nbsp;<B>Employee</B>. A
regular full-time executive employee of RadioShack serving as either a RadioShack
Corporate, RadioShack Division or RadioShack subsidiary officer. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.8</b>&nbsp;<b> Highest Average Plan
Compensation. </B>The average annual Plan Compensation earned by the Participant for the
five consecutive highest-paid Plan years while a Participant. This average shall be
computed by dividing the total of the Participant&#146;s Plan Compensation for such five
Plan Years by the number of years in such five Plan Years for which the Participant had
Plan Compensation. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.9 </b>&nbsp; <b>Leave of Absence.</B>
Any period during which: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;          an Employee
is absent with the prior consent of RadioShack, which consent shall           be granted
under uniform rules applied to all Employees on a nondiscriminatory           basis, but
only if such person is an Employee immediately prior to the           commencement of
such period of authorized absence and resumes employment with           RadioShack not
later than the first working day following the expiration of such           period of
authorized absence; or  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;          an Employee
who is on &#147;qualified military service&#148; as defined under           the Uniformed
Services Employment and Reemployment Rights Act of 1994, but only           if such
person is an Employee immediately prior to his qualified military           service and
resumes employment with RadioShack within the period during which           his
reemployment rights are guaranteed by law.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.10</b>&nbsp;<b> Monthly Plan Benefit
Amount. </B>A monthly amount equal to the Participant&#146;s Plan Benefit, as may be
adjusted pursuant to Section 5.1(b) or (c) or Sections 5.2, 8.4, or 8.5 divided by 120. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.11</B>&nbsp;
<B>Participant.</B> An Employee who has been selected by the Committee and has accepted a
Plan Agreement as provided in Article&nbsp;Three. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.12</B>&nbsp; <B>Plan
Agreement.</B> The agreement between RadioShack and a Participant, entered into in
accordance with Article&nbsp;Three, as may be amended from time to time hereunder. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.13</B>&nbsp; <B>Plan Year</B>.
The twelve month period beginning on January 1and ending December 31, commencing with
calendar year January 1, 1998 through December 31, 1998. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.14</B>&nbsp; <B>Plan Benefit.
</B>An amount equal to the Participant&#146;s Benefit Service Years Credit multiplied by
the Participant&#146;s Highest Average Plan Compensation multiplied by 10. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.15</B>&nbsp; <B>Plan
Compensation</B>. The Participant&#146;s annual base salary and any annual bonus earned by
the Participant during a Plan Year. Plan Compensation shall include any portion of the
Participant&#146;s base salary and bonus that is not includible in taxable income because
of a deferral election under any plan maintained by RadioShack. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.16</B> &nbsp;<B>RadioShack.</B>
RadioShack Corporation, a Delaware corporation, and those subsidiary corporations in which
RadioShack owns at least fifty one percent (51%) of the total combined voting power of all
classes of stock entitled to vote. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.17</B>&nbsp; <B>RadioShack
Subsidiary.</B> Any corporation in which RadioShack owns at least fifty one percent (51%)
of the total combined voting power of all classes of stock entitled to vote. </FONT></P>
<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 2.18</B>&nbsp; <B>Retirement.</B>
The following classifications of Retirement as referred to in this Plan are as follows: </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>Early
Retirement.</B> The voluntary election, as opposed to involuntary           termination
by RadioShack, by a Participant to terminate his employment on or           after
attaining the age of fifty-five (55) years but prior to the           Participant&#146;s
attaining the age of sixty-five (65) years.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>Normal
Retirement.</B> The termination of a Participant&#146;s service with           RadioShack
at the date of attaining age sixty-five (65) years.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>Late
Retirement.</B> The termination of a Participant&#146;s service with           RadioShack
after the Participant&#146;s attaining the age of sixty-five (65)           years.  </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE THREE </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>SELECTION OF
PARTICIPANTS AND <BR>AGREEMENT TO PARTICIPATE </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 3.1</B>&nbsp; <B>Existing
Participants. </B>The Plan is in addition to the RadioShack Corporation Officer&#146;s
Deferred Compensation Plan, the Salary Continuation Plan for Executive Employees of
RadioShack Corporation, the Special Compensation Plan No.1 for RadioShack Corporation
Executive Officers, and the Special Compensation Plan No. 2 for RadioShack Corporation
Executive Officers (collectively, the &#147;Salary Continuation Plans&#148;). The Salary
Continuation Plans have certain participants who, as of December 31, 2005, have been
selected by the Committee, in its sole, absolute and exclusive discretion, to be Plan
Participants and to have their benefits transferred from the respective Salary
Continuation Plans to the Plan by virtue of new Plan Agreements. Upon execution of new
Plan Agreements, these Participants will no longer be participants in their respective
Salary Continuation Plans and will be Plan Participants. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 3.2</B> &nbsp;<B>New
Participants.</B> On and after January 1, 2006, the Committee, in its sole, absolute and
exclusive discretion, shall select, from among the key executive employees of RadioShack
who are serving as either a RadioShack Corporate, RadioShack Division or a RadioShack
Subsidiary officer, candidates for participation in the Plan. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE FOUR </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>NO FUNDING OF PLAN
BENEFITS </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 4.1</B> All benefits
under the Plan or a Plan Agreement represent an unsecured promise to pay by RadioShack
Corporation. The Plan shall be unfunded and the benefits hereunder shall be paid only from
the general assets of RadioShack Corporation resulting in the Participants having no
greater rights than RadioShack Corporation&#146;s general creditors; <U>provided, however,
</U>nothing herein shall prevent or prohibit RadioShack Corporation from establishing a
trust or other arrangement for the purpose of providing for the payment of the benefits
payable under the Plan or Plan Agreement. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE FIVE </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>BENEFITS PAYABLE TO
PARTICIPANTS AND <BR>TO BENEFICIARIES OF PARTICIPANTS </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 5.1</B> Subject to the
terms and conditions of the Plan, upon the Retirement of a Participant, RadioShack agrees
to pay to Participant a Retirement benefit as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          <B>Normal Retirement.</B> If a Participant retires at the date of Normal
          Retirement, then RadioShack agrees to pay to Participant or to the designated
          Beneficiary of Participant in the event of the death of Participant prior to the
          termination of payment of Normal Retirement benefits hereunder, all from its
          general assets, an amount equal to such Participant&#146;s Plan Benefit, such
          sum to be paid as set forth in Section&nbsp;5.3 hereof. </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Default" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          <B>Early Retirement.</B> If a Participant retires at a time that constitutes an
          Early Retirement, then RadioShack agrees to pay to Participant or to the
          designated Beneficiary of Participant in the event of the death of Participant
          prior to the termination of payment of Early Retirement benefits hereunder, all
          from its general assets, an amount equal to such Participant&#146;s Plan
          Benefit, reduced by five percent (5%) per year for each year that Early
          Retirement precedes the date of Normal Retirement. Such year shall be a fiscal
          year beginning on the date a Participant attains age fifty-five (55). Any
          reduction for a part of a year shall be prorated on a daily basis assuming a
          365-day year. Such amount shall be paid as set forth in Section&nbsp;5.3 hereof. </FONT></P>



<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 1; page: 1" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Default" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          <B>Late Retirement.</B> If a Participant retires at a date that constitutes Late
          Retirement, then RadioShack agrees to pay to Participant or to the designated
          Beneficiary of Participant in the event of the death of Participant prior to the
          termination of payment of Late Retirement benefits hereunder, all from its
          general assets, an amount equal to such Participant&#146;s Plan Benefit, reduced
          by a percentage determined as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>The percent of reduction of a
Participant&#146;s Plan Benefit shall be measured on a fiscal year beginning on the date
of Participant&#146;s date of birth and shall commence on the day after the date a
Participant attains age&nbsp;70, and any reduction for a part of a year shall be prorated
on a daily basis at the applicable percentage assuming a 365-day year. Such amount shall
be paid as set forth in Section&nbsp;5.3 hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 5.2</B> &nbsp;Subject to the
terms and conditions of the Plan, upon the death of a Participant, but only if the
Participant is an Employee of RadioShack at his death (except as set forth in
Section&nbsp;5.2(b) below) and is not being paid benefits pursuant to a Plan Agreement at
such time, RadioShack agrees to pay to his Beneficiary from its general assets an amount
equal to such Participant&#146;s Plan Benefit. Such amount shall be paid as set forth in
Section 5.3 hereof with respect to such benefits; however, it is further provided that: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;if
a Participant dies while an Employee of RadioShack after the date of his           Normal
Retirement, then the amount payable to his Beneficiary upon a           Participant&#146;s
death shall be reduced as set forth in Section&nbsp;5.1(c)           hereof; and  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp; the
death of a Participant within the first year after involuntary termination           of
employment with RadioShack as provided in Section&nbsp;8.6 shall not defeat           the
right of such Participant&#146;s Beneficiary to receive benefits under this
          Section&nbsp;5.2 so long as an event described in Section&nbsp;8.5(a) or (b)
          occurs within one year of the date of termination of the Participant&#146;s
          employment.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 5.3</B> &nbsp;Except as provided
in Section&nbsp;8.5, the Plan Benefit due and payable to a Participant or his Beneficiary,
as the case may be, upon the Normal Retirement, Early Retirement, or the Late Retirement
of a Participant, or upon the death of a Participant shall be paid in one hundred twenty
(120) equal monthly installments in an amount equal to the Participant&#146;s Monthly Plan
Benefit Amount, commencing on the first day of the month next following one hundred and
eighty days (180) days after Retirement or after RadioShack&#146;s receipt of a certified
death or proof of death certificate verifying the Participant&#146;s death. In the event
of a Change in Control, amounts payable to a Participant or his Beneficiary shall be paid
in the amount and manner specified in Sections 8.5 and 8.6. A Participant shall notify
RadioShack of the effective date of Retirement in such manner as may be specified by
RadioShack. Such notice shall be deemed to be received when actually received by
RadioShack in the manner specified. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 5.4</B>&nbsp; Until actually paid
and delivered to the Participant or to the Beneficiary entitled to same, none of the
benefits payable by RadioShack under this Plan or any Plan Agreement shall be liable for
the debts or liabilities of either the Participant or his Beneficiary, nor shall the same
be subject to seizure by any creditor of the Participant or his Beneficiary under any writ
or proceeding at law, in equity or in bankruptcy. Further, no Participant or Beneficiary
shall have power to sell, assign, transfer, encumber, or in any manner anticipate or
dispose of the benefits to which he is entitled or may become entitled under the Plan or
any Plan Agreement. </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER PAGE="sheet: 2; page: 2" -->
<HR SIZE=5 COLOR=GRAY NOSHADE>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Left Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>Section 5.5 </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;During
the period that Participant is receiving benefits under a Plan Agreement           and
for one (1) year after cessation of payment of benefits, Participant agrees
          that he will not, either directly or indirectly, within the United States of
          America or in any country of the world that RadioShack (or a RadioShack
          Subsidiary) or one of its dealers or franchisees sells Consumer Electronic
          Products (as hereinafter defined) at retail, own, manage, operate, join,
          control, be employed by, be a consultant to, be a partner in, be a creditor of,
          engage in joint operations with, be a stockholder, officer or director of any
          corporation, sole proprietorship or business entity of any type, or participate
          in the ownership, management, direction, or control or in any other manner be
          connected with, any business selling Consumer Electronic Products at retail
          which is at the time of Participant&#146;s engaging in such conduct competitive
          with such products sold by RadioShack except as a stockholder owning less than
          five percent (5%) of the shares of a corporation whose shares are traded on a
          stock exchange or in the over-the-counter market by a member of the National
          Association of Securities Dealers. &#147;Consumer Electronic Products&#148; are
          those type of products sold at the retail level to the ultimate customer as are
          advertised by RadioShack. The manufacture of Consumer Electronic Products or
the           sale of Consumer Electronic Products at levels of distribution other than
the           retail level is not considered a violation of this covenant.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp; In the event
that a Participant engages in any of the activities described in           Section&nbsp;5.5(a),
RadioShack will give notice to the Participant specifying           in detail the alleged
violation of Section&nbsp;5.5(a). Participant will be           allowed ninety (90)&nbsp;days
to cure such default. If the Committee feels there           is continuing competition,
then, without any further notice or opportunity to           cure, and upon determination
by the Committee that such a Participant is engaged           in such activities, such
Committee&#146;s decision to be conclusive and binding           upon all concerned, and
notwithstanding any other provisions of the Plan or of           the Plan Agreement with
such Participant, RadioShack&#146;s obligation to a           Participant to pay any
benefits hereunder shall automatically cease and           terminate and RadioShack shall
have no further obligation to such Participant or           Beneficiary pursuant to the
Plan or the Plan Agreement. RadioShack may also           enforce this provision by suit
for damages which shall include but not be           limited to all sums paid to
Participant hereunder, or for injunction, or both.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 5.6</B> &nbsp;RadioShack may
liquidate out of the interest of a Participant hereunder, but only as Retirement or death
benefits become due and payable hereunder, any outstanding loan or loans or other
indebtedness to RadioShack of a Participant. RadioShack may elect not to distribute
Retirement or death benefits to any Participant or to a Beneficiary unless and until all
unpaid loans or other indebtedness due to RadioShack from such Participant, together with
interest, have been paid in full. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 5.7</B> &nbsp;Subject to
termination or amendment of the Plan, Plan Agreement, or both, a Participant&#146;s
participation in the Plan shall continue during his Disability or his taking a Leave of
Absence notwithstanding the status of the Participant&#146;s employment with RadioShack. A
Participant who is Disabled or on Leave of Absence shall notify RadioShack of his date of
Retirement as provided in Section&nbsp;5.3 hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE SIX </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>AMENDMENTS OF PLAN
AGREEMENTS </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 6.1</B>&nbsp; The Committee may
enter into amendments to the Plan Agreement with any Participant for the purpose of
amending any provision of this Plan as it might apply to a Participant. In such cases, the
acceptance of an amendment by a Participant is voluntary and until the amended Plan
Agreement has been submitted to and accepted by him, it shall not be effective. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE SEVEN </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>BENEFICIARIES OF
PARTICIPANTS </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 7.1</B> &nbsp;At the time of his acceptance
of a Plan Agreement, a Participant shall be required to designate the Beneficiary to whom
benefits under the Plan and his Plan Agreement will be payable upon his death. A
Beneficiary may be one (1) or more persons or entities, such as dependents, persons who
are natural objects of the Participant&#146;s bounty, an inter vivos or testamentary
trust, or his estate. Such Beneficiaries may be designated contingently or successively as
the Participant may direct. The designation of his Beneficiary shall be made by the
Participant on a Beneficiary Designation Form to be furnished by the Committee and filed
with it. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 7.2</B>&nbsp; A Participant may
change his Beneficiary, as he may desire, by filing new and amendatory Beneficiary
Designation Forms with the Committee. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 7.3</B>&nbsp; In the event a
Participant designates more than one&nbsp;(1) Beneficiary to receive benefit payments
simultaneously, each such Beneficiary shall be paid such proportion of such benefits as
the Participant shall have designated. If no such percentage designation has been made,
the Committee shall hold all benefit payments until the Beneficiaries agree as to the
distribution of the funds or a judicial determination has been made. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 7.4</B> &nbsp;If the designated
Beneficiary dies before the Participant in question and no Beneficiary was successively
named, or if the designated Beneficiary dies before complete payment of the deceased
Participant&#146;s benefits have been made and no Beneficiary was successively named, the
Committee shall direct that such benefits (or the balance thereof) be paid to those
persons who are the deceased Participant&#146;s heirs-at-law determined in accordance with
the laws of descent and distribution in force at the date hereof in the State of Texas for
separate personal property, such determination to be made as though the Participant had
died intestate and domiciled in Texas. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 7.5</B>&nbsp; Whenever any person
entitled to payments under this Plan shall be a minor or under other legal disability or
in the sole judgment of the Committee shall otherwise be unable to apply such payments to
his own best interest and advantage (as in the case of illness, whether mental or
physical, or where the person not under legal disability is unable to preserve his estate
for his own best interest), the Committee may in the exercise of its discretion direct all
or any portion of such payments to be made in any one or more of the following ways unless
claims shall have been made therefor by an existing and duly appointed guardian,
conservator, committee or other duly appointed legal representative, in which event
payment shall be made to such representative: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;directly
to such person unless such person shall be an infant or shall have been           legally
adjudicated incompetent at the time of the payment;  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp; to
the spouse, child, parent or other blood relative to be expended on behalf of
          the person entitled or on behalf of those dependents as to whom the person
          entitled has the duty of support;  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp; to
a recognized charity or governmental institution to be expended for the           benefit
of the person entitled or for the benefit of those dependents as to whom           the
person entitled has the duty of support; or  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;to
any other institution, approved by the Committee, to be expended for the
          benefit of the person entitled or for the benefit of those dependents as to
whom           the person entitled has the duty of support.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>The decision of the Committee will, in
each case, be final and binding upon all persons and the Committee shall not be obligated
to see to the proper application or expenditure of any payments so made. Any payment made
pursuant to the power herein conferred upon the Committee shall operate as a complete
discharge of the obligations of RadioShack and of the Committee. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 7.6</B> &nbsp;If the Committee
has any doubt as to the proper Beneficiary to receive payments hereunder, the Committee
shall have the right to withhold such payments until the matter is finally adjudicated or
the Committee may direct RadioShack to bring a suit for interpleader in any appropriate
court, pay any amounts due into the court, and RadioShack shall have the right to recover
its reasonable attorney&#146;s fees from such proceeds so paid or to be paid. Any payment
made by the Committee, in good faith and in accordance with this Plan, shall fully
discharge the Committee and RadioShack from all further obligations with respect to such
payments. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE EIGHT </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>TERMINATION OF
PARTICIPATION </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 8.1</B> &nbsp;Except as provided
in Sections 5.2(b),&nbsp;8.4, 8.5, 8.6, 10.1, and 10.2 hereof, termination of a
Participant&#146;s employment with RadioShack other than by reason of Retirement,
Disability or death, or during a period of a Leave of Absence, whether by action of
RadioShack or the Participant&#146;s resignation, shall terminate the Participant&#146;s
participation in the Plan. Neither the Plan nor the Plan Agreement shall in any way
obligate RadioShack to continue the employment of a Participant, nor will either limit the
right of RadioShack to terminate a Participant&#146;s employment at any time, for any
reason, with or without cause. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 8.2</B> &nbsp;Except as provided
in Sections&nbsp;8.4, 8.5, 8.6, 10.1 and 10.2 hereof, participation in the Plan by a
Participant shall also terminate if the Plan or his Plan Agreement is terminated by
RadioShack in accordance with Article Ten. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 8.3</B> &nbsp;Except as provided
in Sections&nbsp;8.4, 8.5, 8.6, 10.1, and 10.2 hereof, upon termination of a
Participant&#146;s participation in the Plan, all of RadioShack&#146;s obligations to the
Participant and his Beneficiary under the Plan and Plan Agreement and each of them, shall
terminate and be of no further effect. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 8.4</B> Except as provided
in Sections 8.5, 8.6, 10.1 and 10.2, if a Participant&#146;s participation in the Plan is
terminated, by: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          termination of the Plan; </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          termination of a Plan Agreement; or </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          termination of employment for any reasons other than </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          death or Retirement, which shall be governed by Article&nbsp;Five, or </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;
          dishonest or fraudulent conduct of a Participant or indictment of a Participant
          for a felony crime involving moral turpitude, in which event no vesting under
          Section&nbsp;8.4, 8.6, 10.1, or 10.2 shall occur, </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>then such Participant shall be
entitled, as set forth below, to a percentage of his Plan Benefit as follows: </FONT></P>

     <TH ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2"></FONT></TH>

     <TD><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

</FONT></TD>
     <TD><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2"></FONT></TD>
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">A percent as determined<BR>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in 5.1(c) hereto
</FONT></TD>
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2"></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
     <TD><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2"></FONT></TD>
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">Age 75 and thereafter
</FONT></TD>
     <TD><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2"></FONT></TD>
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2">0%
</FONT></TD>
     <TD ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE="2"></FONT></TD></TR>

</TABLE>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>The amount payable under this
Section&nbsp;8.4 shall be determined as of the date of the event set forth in
Section&nbsp;8.4(a), (b) or (c) hereof and such amount as so determined at that time shall
not be altered or changed thereafter except that the provisions of Section&nbsp;5.5 hereof
shall remain fully applicable during the Participant&#146;s employment by RadioShack,
during the payment of benefits under this Section&nbsp;8.4 and for one (1) year after
termination of employment or payment of benefits. The amount payable under this
Section&nbsp;8.4 shall be paid as set forth in Section&nbsp;5.3 hereunder to commence on
the first day of the month next following one hundred and eighty (180) days after
cessation of Participant&#146;s employment with RadioShack. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><b>Section 8.5</b>&nbsp;  Notwithstanding
anything to the contrary in the Plan,</FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp; In
the event of a Change in Control, every Participant immediately shall be           vested
with his Plan Benefit determined without regard to Section&nbsp;5.1(b)           but
subject to Section&nbsp;5.1(c). Such retirement benefit shall be payable in           a
lump sum on the first day of the month next following the date on which such
          Participant&#146;s employment with RadioShack Corporation terminates for any
          reason (the &#147;Termination Date&#148;). Such lump sum payment shall equal
the           present value of the Participant&#146;s Plan Benefit (as adjusted pursuant
to           Section 5.1(c), as applicable) discounted for interest at the Pension
Benefit           Guaranty Corporation&#146;s Immediate Annuity Rate used to value
benefits for           single-employer plans terminating on the Termination Date,
compounded           semi-annually.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
Participant or Beneficiary who on the date of a Change in Control was           receiving
benefits under the Plan shall be entitled to receive a lump sum equal           to the
present value of the remaining Plan Benefit, payable on the first day of           the
month next following the date of the Change in Control, calculated in a           manner
consistent with Section&nbsp;8.5(a).  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 8.6</B>&nbsp;In the event that a
Participant&#146;s employment with RadioShack Corporation is involuntarily terminated for
any reason other than those reasons set forth in Section&nbsp;8.4(c)(ii), and within a
one-year period beginning on the date of such termination there occurs a Change in
Control, then such Participant, or his Beneficiary if such Participant dies after
termination of employment, shall be entitled to receive a lump sum equal to the present
value of the Participant&#146;s Plan Benefit (determined in a manner consistent with
Section&nbsp;8.5(a)), payable in a lump sum on the first day of the month next following
the date of the Change in Control. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section&nbsp;8.7</B>&nbsp;
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary in the Plan, upon a Change in Control, the
provisions of Sections&nbsp;5.5 and 5.6 shall lapse and become null and void. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE NINE </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ADMINISTRATION OF THE
PLAN </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 9.1</B> &nbsp;The Plan shall be
administered by the Committee. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section&nbsp;9.2</B> &nbsp;In addition to
the express powers and authorities accorded the Committee under the Plan, it shall be
responsible in its sole, absolute and exclusive discretion for: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;construing
and interpreting the Plan;  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;computing
and certifying to RadioShack the amount of benefits to be provided in           each Plan
Agreement for the Participant or the Beneficiary of the Participant;           and  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp; determining
the right of a Participant or a Beneficiary to payments under the           Plan and
otherwise authorizing disbursements of such payments by RadioShack.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>In these and all other respects, the
Committee&#146;s decisions shall be conclusive and binding upon all concerned. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 9.3</B> &nbsp;RadioShack agrees to
hold harmless and indemnify the members of the Committee against any and all expenses,
claims and causes of action by or on behalf of any and all parties whomsoever, and all
losses therefrom, including without limitation the cost of defense and attorney&#146;s
fees, based upon or arising out of any act or omission relating to or in connection with
the Plan other than losses resulting from any such Committee member&#146;s fraud or
willful misconduct. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE TEN </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>TERMINATION OR
AMENDMENT OF THE PLAN </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>OR PLAN AGREEMENTS </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 10.1</B>&nbsp; RadioShack
reserves the right to terminate or amend this Plan or any Plan Agreement, in whole or in
part, at any time, from time to time, by resolution of the Committee, provided, however,
no amendment to the Plan or to any Plan Agreement shall alter the vested rights of a
Participant or Beneficiary applicable on the effective date of such termination or
amendment, and such vested rights shall remain unchanged. Rights are deemed to have vested
if benefits are actually being paid or if the only condition precedent to the payment of
benefits is the termination of employment (unless terminated for reasons set forth in
Section&nbsp;8.4(c)(ii), in which event benefits are forfeited) with RadioShack or the
giving notice of Retirement or the occurrence of an event described in Section&nbsp;8.5(a)
or (b). </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 10.2 </B>&nbsp; Notwithstanding
anything to the contrary in the Plan,</FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp; Sections&nbsp;8.5,
8.6, 8.7, 8.8 and this Section&nbsp;10.2 shall not be amended           or terminated at
any time.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp; For
a period of one&nbsp;(1) year following a Change in Control, the Plan or           Plan
Agreement shall not be terminated or amended in any way, nor shall the           manner
in which the Plan is administered be changed in a way that adversely           affects
the Participants&#146; right to existing or future RadioShack-provided           benefits
or contributions provided hereunder, including, but not limited to, any           change
in, or to, the eligibility requirements, benefit formulae and manner and
          optional forms of payments.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
amendment or termination of the Plan prior to a Change in Control that           (i)&nbsp;was
at the request of a third party who has indicated an intention or           taken steps
reasonably calculated to effect a Change in Control or           (ii)&nbsp;otherwise
arose in connection with, or in anticipation of, a Change in           Control, shall be
null and void and shall have no effect whatsoever.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;In
the event the Plan or any Plan Agreement is terminated or adversely amended           to
the detriment of any Participant and within a one-year period from the
          effective date of any such amendment or termination a Change in Control occurs,
          then any Participant so affected whose employment with RadioShack Corporation
is           terminated, voluntarily or involuntarily, within a three-year period from
the           date of the Change in Control shall be entitled to receive those benefits
set           forth in Section&nbsp;8.5 hereof to the same extent and in the same amounts
as           though such amendment or termination of the Plan or Plan Agreement had not
          occurred. This Section&nbsp;10.2(d) shall not apply to any Participant who, as
          of the date of the Change in Control, has previously retired or has otherwise
          voluntarily terminated his employment with RadioShack Corporation.  </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>ARTICLE ELEVEN </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>MISCELLANEOUS </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.1</B> &nbsp;The Plan and Plan
Agreement and each of their provisions shall be construed and their validity determined
under the laws of the State of Texas. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.2</B>&nbsp; The masculine
gender, where appearing in the Plan or Plan Agreement, shall be deemed to include the
feminine gender. The words &#147;herein&#148;, &#147;hereunder&#148; and other similar
compounds of the word &#147;here&#148; shall mean and refer to the entire Plan and Plan
Agreement, not to any particular provision, section or subsection, and words used in the
singular or plural may be construed as though in the plural or singular where they would
so apply. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.3</B>&nbsp; Any action brought
by a Participant under the Plan or Plan Agreement shall only be brought in the appropriate
state or federal court for Tarrant County, Texas. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.4</B> &nbsp;Any person born on
February&nbsp;29 shall be deemed to have been born on the immediately preceding
February&nbsp;28 for all purposes of this Plan. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.5</B> &nbsp;This Plan shall be
binding upon and inure to the benefit of any successor of RadioShack and any such
successor shall be deemed substituted for RadioShack under the terms of this Plan. As used
in this Plan, the term &#147;successor&#148; shall include any person, firm, corporation,
or other business entity which at any time, whether by merger, purchase, or otherwise,
acquires all or substantially all of the assets or business of RadioShack. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.6</B> &nbsp;A Participant
shall not be required to mitigate the amount of any payment provided for in this Plan by
seeking other employment or otherwise. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.7</B> &nbsp;In the event that
a Participant institutes any legal action to enforce his rights under, or to recover
damages for breach of any of the terms of this Plan or any Plan Agreement, the
Participant, if he is the prevailing party, shall be entitled to recover from RadioShack
all actual expenses incurred in the prosecution of said suit including but not limited to
attorneys&#146; fees, court costs, and all other actual expenses. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.8</B>&nbsp;Notwithstanding
all other provisions in the Plan, in the event a Participant is entitled to benefits under
two (2) separate sections of the Plan, the maximum a Participant may receive under this
Plan is his Plan Benefit, payable in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.3 hereof. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2><B>Section 11.9</B> &nbsp;Notwithstanding
any other provision of the Plan to the contrary, until the Plan is amended and restated to
reflect the requirements of Internal Revenue Code section 409A, the Plan shall be
administered in accordance with all applicable requirements of Internal Revenue Code
section 409A and the regulations or guidance issued with regard thereto, and any
distribution, acceleration or election feature that could result in the early inclusion in
gross income shall be deemed restricted or limited to the extent necessary to avoid such
result. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN=RIGHT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>EXHIBIT 10.53</FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>RADIOSHACK CORPORATION <BR>OFFICER&#146;S
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT<BR>PLAN AGREEMENT </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold 1-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=CENTER><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>January 1,
&laquo;Year&raquo; </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Left Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>To: &laquo;FullName&raquo; </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>The Management Development and
Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors of RadioShack Corporation has selected
you to participate in the RadioShack Corporation Officer&#146;s Supplemental Executive
Retirement Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;). A copy of the Plan is being furnished to you with
this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>Your participation in the Plan is
voluntary and conditioned upon your acceptance of this Plan Agreement in the manner
provided below, by which it shall be agreed between us as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(1)</FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=95%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>
          Your participation in the Plan as a Participant and the rights accruing to you
          and your designated Beneficiary thereunder shall be in all respects subject to
          the terms and conditions of the Plan, the full text of which, and as it may be
          from time to time amended, is incorporated herein by reference. Capitalized
          terms, unless otherwise defined herein, shall have the meaning ascribed to them
          in the Plan. You agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of the Plan and
          specifically, but without limitation, to the noncompetition agreement provisions
          set forth in Section 5.5 of the Plan. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(2)</FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=95%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>
          The amount of benefits payable by RadioShack to you as a Participant pursuant to
          the terms and conditions of the Plan is the Plan Benefit as calculated under the
          Plan. The Plan Benefit will be payable to you in 120 monthly installments or in
          such manner as otherwise provided in the Plan. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>

          You acknowledge receipt of a Beneficiary Designation Form furnished you herewith

          provided below, you will deliver such form completed as therein required. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>If you desire to participate in the
Plan, please accept and return the enclosed copy of this Plan Agreement, together with
your completed Beneficiary Designation Form, to the Vice President &#150; Compensation and
Employee Benefits, on or before thirty days from the date hereof, whereupon you shall
become a Participant in the Plan according and subject to the terms hereof. If you do not
accept and return such copy within the above time period, then we will assume that you
have voluntarily elected not to participate in the Plan. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Center Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->

&laquo;Year&raquo; </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Head Major Left Bold-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<H1 ALIGN=LEFT><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>To: &laquo;FullName&raquo; </FONT></H1>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>The Management Development and
Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors of RadioShack Corporation has selected
you to participate in the RadioShack Corporation Officer&#146;s Supplemental Executive
Retirement Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;). A copy of the Plan is being furnished to you with
this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>Your participation in the Plan is
voluntary and conditioned upon your acceptance of this Plan Agreement in the manner
provided below, by which it shall be agreed between us as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(1)</FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=95%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>
          Your participation in the Plan as a Participant and the rights accruing to you
          and your designated Beneficiary thereunder shall be in all respects subject to
          the terms and conditions of the Plan, the full text of which, and as it may be
          from time to time amended, is incorporated herein by reference. Capitalized
          terms, unless otherwise defined herein, shall have the meaning ascribed to them
          in the Plan. You agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of the Plan and
          specifically, but without limitation, to the noncompetition agreement provisions
          set forth in Section 5.5 of the Plan. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(2)</FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=95%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>
          The Plan Benefit payable by RadioShack to you as a Participant pursuant to the
          terms and conditions of the Plan shall be the greater of (1) the Plan Benefit as
          calculated under the Plan or (2) the Plan Benefit Amount or Plan Compensation,
          as the case may be, as defined and calculated as of the date of your retirement
          under one or more of the Salary Continuation Plans as applicable to you. The
          Plan Benefit will be payable to you in 120 monthly installments or in such
          manner as otherwise provided in the Plan. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(3)</FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=95%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>
          You acknowledge receipt of a Beneficiary Designation Form furnished you herewith
          and agree that upon your acceptance and return of this Plan Agreement, as
          provided below, you will deliver such form completed as therein required. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
     <TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
          <TR VALIGN=TOP>
          <TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>(4)</FONT></TD>
          <TD WIDTH=95%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>
          Your Plan Agreement dated ______ is hereby terminated and of no further force
          and effect. </FONT></TD>
          </TR>
          </TABLE>
          <BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>If you desire to participate in the
Plan, please accept and return the enclosed copy of this Plan Agreement, together with
your completed Beneficiary Designation Form, to the Vice President &#150; Compensation and
Employee Benefits, on or before thirty days from the date hereof, whereupon you shall
become a Participant in the Plan according and subject to the terms hereof. If you do not
accept and return such copy within the above time period, then we will assume that you
have voluntarily elected not to participate in the Plan. </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>We hereby consent to the incorporation
by reference in the Registration Statements on Form S-3 (Nos. 333-27297, 333-44125,
333-54276, 333-60803, 333-75766 and 333-96583) and to the incorporation by reference in
the Registration Statements on Form S-8 (Nos. 33-23178, 33-33189, 33-51019, 33-51599,
33-51603, 333-27437, 333-47893, 333-48331, 333-49369, 333-63659, 333-63661, 333-81405,
333-84057, 333-74894, 333-101792, 333-102141, 333-102142, 333-110961, 333-118121, and
333-118122) of RadioShack Corporation of our report dated March 15, 2006 relating to the
consolidated financial statements, management&#146;s assessment of the effectiveness of
internal control over financial reporting and the effectiveness of internal control over
financial reporting, which appears in this Form 10-K. </FONT></P>

          over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent
          fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an
          annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to
          materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
          reporting; and </FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang LV 1-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>   5.  </FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH=90%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based
          on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to
          the registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the
registrant&#146;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lvl 3-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD WIDTH=15%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>           (a)  </FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH=80%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation
          of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
          adversely affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and
          report financial information; and</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Hang Lvl 3-Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<TABLE WIDTH=100% CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD WIDTH=15%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH=5%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>           (b)  </FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH=80%><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees
          who have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over
          financial reporting. </FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>

CERTIFICATIONS </FONT></P>

<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para Flush Lv 0-Arial" FSL="Default" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>In connection with the Annual Report
of RadioShack Corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form 10-K for the period ending
December 31, 2005 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof
(the &#147;Report&#148;), we, Claire H. Babrowski, Acting Chief Executive Officer of the
Company, and David G. Barnes, Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify to our
knowledge, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &sect; 1350, as adopted pursuant to &sect; 906 of the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that: </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;      (1) &nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Report fully complies with the requirements of section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934; and </FONT></P>


<!-- MARKER FORMAT-SHEET="Para (List) Indent Lv 0- Arial" FSL="Project" -->
<P><FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif" SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;      (2) &nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the
financial condition and result of operations of the Company. </FONT></P>
